Entry.JapaneseText: ……楽観的かもしんねえけどさ、 今なら、ユリスとまともに戦えると思わないか？
Entry.EnglishText: Maybe I'm just being optimistic, but... Am I the only one who thinks we stand a chance against Yuris now?

Entry.JapaneseText: ボクもそう思う！ フォルスとも、 聖獣の力とも違う、強い力を感じるもん！
Entry.EnglishText: I was thinking that too! I'm feeling a strong power that <Italic>isn't</Italic> Force <Italic>or</Italic> the power of the Sacred Beasts!

Entry.JapaneseText: ああ、ユリスの領域で感じつづけていた 邪悪な空気も、今は感じない。
Entry.EnglishText: Indeed, I can no longer feel the evil that permeates Yuris's Realm.

Entry.JapaneseText: ユリスの力が弱まったのかしら……
Entry.EnglishText: Could it be that Yuris's power has gotten weaker...?

Entry.JapaneseText: 違うわ。私たちが強い力を得たのよ。 ユリスに対抗する力を……
Entry.EnglishText: No. What we've gotten is a strong power that can stand up to Yuris's might...

Entry.JapaneseText: そうだ……今なら戦える。 きっと、ユリスを倒せるはずだ……！
Entry.EnglishText: Yes... Now's the time to fight. I know that we can defeat Yuris!
